translations: v．懒洋洋地躺或靠：以悠闲、舒适的姿势躺或靠在某处。
· He lolled on the sofa all day.
他整天懒洋洋地躺在沙发上。

sentences.sentence: My head lolled against his shoulder.
sentences.translation: 我把头懒懒地靠在他的肩上。

sentences.sentence: When he let go the head lolled sideways.
sentences.translation: 他一放手，脑袋便垂向一侧。

sentences.sentence: He lolled back in his chair by the fire.
sentences.translation: 他懒洋洋地靠着椅背坐在炉火边。
